title: Handle a Customer Pickup Order
description: A local customer chooses to pick up their order directly from the warehouse instead of having it shipped.

tasks.description: The customer places an order and selects 'Customer Pickup'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is flagged for pickup.

tasks.description: The warehouse staff picks and stages the order in the customer pickup area.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is prepared and set aside.

tasks.description: Notify the customer that their order is ready for pickup.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer receives an email or SMS notification.

tasks.description: When the customer arrives, verify their identity and have them sign for the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer's identity is verified, and they receive their goods.
